Package FileManager

Class FileManager

java.lang.Object
FileManager.FileManager
public class FileManager extends Object
A static class which contains operations related to File Management. These operations include, saving diets as an editable file, saving diets as a PDF, reading and writing to the aliment.data file, and loading diets from editable files.
Author:
kxg708

    • FONT_FILE_LOCATION

      public static final String FONT_FILE_LOCATION
      location of PDF printing font file. The format for this location string is different with the one above, because it is being passed to the App.class.getResource() method.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileManager

      public FileManager()

  • Method Details

    • openDietFile

      public static Diet openDietFile() throws FileNotFoundException, IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      This method opens a file chooser window where user can select a diet file, and calls the private method readAlimentDataFile() to read its contents.
      Returns:
      the Diet object read from file. If no file is chosen null is returned.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - in case of error.
      IOException - in case of error.
      ClassNotFoundException - in case of error.

    • saveAsDietFile

      public static void saveAsDietFile(Diet diet)
      This method takes a diet and opens a file chooser window for the user to save the diet as a file. It calls the saveDietFile(java.io.File, GeneticAlgorithm.Diet) to do this. This method is called when a diet is being saved in a new file.
      Parameters:
      diet - the Diet object which should be written to the file.

    • saveDietFile

      public static void saveDietFile(File file, Diet diet) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException
      Takes a Diet object and a File object, and writes the diet to the file. It is used in saveAsDietFile(GeneticAlgorithm.Diet) and also in dietDisplayWindow when a previously saved Diet file has been modified and should be saved. In this case, a file chooser is not needed to be displayed.
      Parameters:
      diet - the Diet object which should be written.
      file - the file to which the Diet object should be written.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - in case of error.
      IOException - in case of error.

    • saveAsPDF

      public static void saveAsPDF(Diet diet)
      This method takes in a Diet object, and prints the meal options of each meal on a separate page in a PDF, using printPage(org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDDocument, java.util.ArrayList, java.lang.String) and opens a file chooser to save the PDF location. If no file is selected by file chooser, it is not saved anywhere.
      Parameters:
      diet - the Diet object which should be printed to the PDF.

    • readAlimentDataFile

      public static void readAlimentDataFile()
      This method reads the list of aliments in the aliments.data file, and saves it in the App.aliments global variable. It is called each time the program is launched.

    • addToAlimentDataFile

      public static void addToAlimentDataFile(Aliment aliment)
      This method takes an aliment object and adds it to the App.aliments global variable. It also updates the data file by running rewriteToAlimentDataFile() It is used when creating a new aliment.
      Parameters:
      aliment - the aliment to be added.

    • removeFromAlimentDataFile

      public static void removeFromAlimentDataFile(Aliment aliment)
      This method takes an aliment object and removes it from the App.aliments global variable. It also updates the data file by running rewriteToAlimentDataFile() It is used when deleting an aliment.
      Parameters:
      aliment - the aliment to be removed.
